casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William Henry RAINES. No. 211A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2007. Jonathan E. Broun, Durham, for Raines. William P. Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Joan Cunningham, Assistant Attorney General, Brad Greenway, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th day of January *4042007 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (William Henry Raines) shall have up to and including the 7th day of February 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of January 2007."
